column3:
To be clear, this solves the following issue:

Normal reject message

```
2015-12-07 20:16:52 peer=1096 Reject tx code 64: non-final: hash 54fae12b1dc553ec56137138ad28304569c9b3a69791fca5a02664b379a7d6ba
```

Reject message from 0.11.99+

```
2015-12-04 16:07:00 peer=322 Reject tx code 66: : hash 6e6f69746361736e617274206565726620646574696d696c20657461721d0000
```

Reason seems empty
Added basic tests for rejection of blocks and transactions.\n(tested that they pass with this patch, and fail without)\n
@sdaftuar Mind taking a look at the test changes?\n
post-merge ACK.  The extension to the test framework seems like a good idea!\n
This is cherry-picked to 0.12 as 44fef99e666e85caa7616765412d7becf97ab673, removing needs backport label\n
